Title: Effects of dual task interference on memory intrusions for affective images
Author: Pearson, David G.; Sawyer, Tina
ComparisonCondition: Verbal interference task (articulatory suppression + Oral Random Number Generation Interference Task)
ResultSummary: Both conditions did not significantly in terms of diary intrusions.
